scripts.db:migrate:local: find ./drizzle -name '*.sql' -type f | grep -E '^./drizzle/[0-9]' | sort -V | while read file; do echo "Applying $file..."; temp_file=$(mktemp); sed 's/CREATE TABLE /CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS /g; s/CREATE UNIQUE INDEX /CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS /g' "$file" > "$temp_file"; wrangler d1 execute petaboo --local --file="$temp_file"; rm "$temp_file"; done && echo "Database path: $(pwd)/../../.wrangler/state/v3/d1/miniflare-D1DatabaseObject/" && find ../../.wrangler/state/v3/d1/miniflare-D1DatabaseObject/ -name '*.sqlite' -exec echo "SQLite file: {}" \;
scripts.db:migrate:prod: find ./drizzle -name '*.sql' -type f | sort -V | while read file; do echo "Applying $file..."; wrangler d1 execute petaboo --remote --file="$file" || echo "Already applied or error: $file"; done
